website_summaries.verdict: With this pair's gel-infused fiber, comfort that most users brag about, and budget-friendly price, you won't find a better deal in this class.
pros: Plushy material with a gusseted design add comfort to the gel-fiber fill that helps prevent heat build-up
You get 2 for the price, plus a 30-day satisfaction guarantee
cons: Some complaints of the loft being too thick, but it tends to break down a bit with use
Only available in 1 size, which won't fit all pillow cases

customer_reviews.title: Don't fall for the 5-star reviews
customer_reviews.text: These pillows aren't terrible, but they are definitely not as comfortable as I thought they would be. Will not be buying them again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: BrunetteSpaceCadet

customer_reviews.title: Pillow is too large height wise & stiff
customer_reviews.text: For as pricey as they are I was expecting 100% comfort, but these pillows are too high/puffy. The biggest problem is that you don’t really sink into the pillow because the air has trouble escaping the material especially if you get covers for them. Not bad if you are using pillows to lean back on or if you are using them between legs but to sleep on I always wake up with a sore neck in the morning. Had a better experience with cooled memory foam type pillows which were half the price.
customer_reviews.author: eric magana

customer_reviews.title: Alright, alright, alright.
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping these pillows would have been like the ones I found at the Holiday Inn hotel chain. Yet, they are a little to thick and seems to irritate my neck. Even though I wanted to like these pillows, I've found myself going back to my older pillows and these have gone between my legs or ended up on the floor. If you have neck issues, stay away from these pillows.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rose

customer_reviews.title: They arrive flat and stay flat. No wonder Not available anymore.
customer_reviews.text: Foam pillows are THE way to go, not these. After spending hundreds of dollars trying different pillows for a good night supportive sleep, the foam pillows are the best. Thought I would give these a try but like many they go flat quickly while you are trying to sleep. Lets think about this, they arrive in a vacuum package and very flat. You have to fluff them up and soon thereafter they almost resume their original flat shape. With a foam pillow thats really supportive to the head and neck, and arrives in the same shape they stay in all night says a lot. Avoid these pillows and thats easy now as they are listed as not available anymore! Hmmmm
customer_reviews.author: CatDaddy & Biatch

customer_reviews.title: Like sleeping on a cloud
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful pillows. It seems that each time I finally break down and buy new pillows I find I am disappointed. They feel and look great in the store or when I first use them, but I still end up hurting and uncomfortable almost immediately. These pillows are like sleeping on a cloud. They are soft, but give needed support. They bounce right back to their original shape. They appear to be well made. I'll never waste money again on those pillows made with chunks of latex nor other memory foam pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Expected more for the price & Review of 5
customer_reviews.text: I got my pillow early today so maybe I haven’t given it a fair chance! I was disappointed as soon as I saw it-FLAT! It did puff up, but after I put my head on it, it flattened again. The coolness doesn’t last long! I’ve had my head on it about 30 min & the coolness is gone! I made a bad decision to pay as much as I did for these pillows. Just regular pillows!
customer_reviews.author: Hummer

customer_reviews.title: helping my morning neck pain
customer_reviews.text: I've only used the pillow for two nights so far but my neck hurts much less. I'm a side sleeper and pretty petite. It's been hard to find a pillow that isn't too tall but not too pancake flat either. These kinda mold themselves to how you want. It's a little flat on its own but you can bunch it up how you want it and it stays that way. Pretty slick. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: R. Zier

customer_reviews.title: Heaven in a pillow
customer_reviews.text: After going through countless pillows, from hundreds of manufacturers, I found HEAVEN in these pillows!! No more neck pain. No more headaches. I now sleep deeper and wakeup refreshed. They hold their shape cradling your head and neck in perfect alignment to the spine. If you are on the fence about buying pillows online...do it! I did and I'm happy for a good night's sleep!
customer_reviews.author: B. L. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Nice....really nice.....
customer_reviews.text: These are nice. Really nice. Was going to order a different brand but then I saw all of the recent mold issues on the top-selling brands. We ordered King size and these are just right.....soft but plenty supportive as stated by other reviewers. Compression in the center under full weight of the head is less than 50%.
customer_reviews.author: Picard

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and comfortable but firm to sleep in
customer_reviews.text: I am very picky when it comes to choosing pillows. These were suggested by one of my friend and after I received them everything I was told about them were 100% true. Very soft and comfortable but firm to sleep in. Does not get hot or sweaty at all, the Gel keeps them cool through out the night. Would definitely recommend to my friends and family 5Stars....
customer_reviews.author: HMK

customer_reviews.title: Too plushy for my liking
customer_reviews.text: These pillows are very soft and plush. A little too plush for my taste. I have been using them nightly for a few months. They don’t give the greatest neck support. I have to keep my head on the outer areas of the pillow, if my head is lying in the center of the pillow, I feel like I’m being smothered from all the “plushness”.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Horton

customer_reviews.title: good pillows, just right
customer_reviews.text: I really like these pillows, firm enough, yet nice and soft to sleep on. They seem really well made, and so far, I have not ruined one yet, I am tough on pillows!! They are fairly heavy too, nice quality, probably will order more if they come back in stock. Reasonable price also for two nice heavy pillows.
customer_reviews.author: VeeBee

customer_reviews.title: Quality has changed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these pillows a few months ago and loved them! Full of support, sturdy, and fluffy. I like firm pillows. However, I purchased another set for my new house and these are not the same. They’re not nearly as soft or as firm. They’re very flat, actually. I’ve fluffed them up and given them time to grow, as the packaging indicates. I know that I ordered the same pillow as before because I clicked the re-order button. These pillows are expensive and I expected something more. I will be reaching out to Amazon for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Saul J. Ulloa

customer_reviews.title: Great pillows at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and full pillow. We are really enjoying these so far to go with our new mattress! They do stay cooler than past pillows I've used as well which I assume is due to the gel fibers. I'm not waking up in the middle of the need needing to flip my pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good for side or stomach sleepers
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is soft, plump, plush and well made. Was comfortable in side and back positions, almost like a body pillow in king size. When. I layed on my back, however, I didn't feel my neck was supported and was waking up with a neck ache.
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee

customer_reviews.title: Soft and fluffy
customer_reviews.text: A little too squishy for me, but my husband loves them. They don't flatten out and stay nice and fluffy. If you like a firm pillow though this might not be for you.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie Davis

customer_reviews.title: Nice Pillows But Fairly Flat
customer_reviews.text: These pillows are a nice quality; however, they are pretty flat, and I don't even like a tall pillow! I have to stack both pillows together for a good height.
customer_reviews.author: GH

customer_reviews.title: Great pillows.
customer_reviews.text: These pillows are the best ones I have ever owned. Very soft, and hold there shape very well. Heavy and cool to the touch. Hands down my favorites. If I ever need to purchase pillows again I will definitely be getting these again.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan S.

customer_reviews.title: I was hoping for something better. From day 1
customer_reviews.text: For what I paid, I was hoping for something better. From day 1, one pillow was MUCH thinner than the other--no consistency. After about a month, they were both flat and have no support, are stupid lumpy. I wish I had returned them day 1 like I wanted to. I love Amazon, but this product needs to be gone!!! DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fluffy and cool!
customer_reviews.text: This puppy actually stays pretty cool. Flattish, so if you roll to your back or tummy you won't regret it, but enough fluff for side sleeping. It is my new fave pillow.
customer_reviews.author: RLynn

customer_reviews.title: Love our pillows
customer_reviews.text: Love our pillows. Children do, too! They seemed oversized; however, they fit in the cases. King for King, Standard for Standard. These are the best investment we have made in pillows in a long time. Thank you for the good night sleeps we have these days. It has been a while since I had one.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Freed

customer_reviews.title: They are amazing. We have a king sized bed
customer_reviews.text: I guess I'm joining the crowd on these pillow reviews. They are amazing. We have a king sized bed, so I ordered queen pillows, since they run big. The queen pillows do fit perfectly in my king pillow cases. Pillows are luxurious, squishy yet firm and cooling. Just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Horton

customer_reviews.title: Love these pillows
customer_reviews.text: Love these pillows! Been sleeping like a baby since we got them. I have had some really back neck pain and I heard that a good pillow would help. After all of the reviews I read and the affordable price, decided to give these a try. They are very good quality and after about a month they are still as fluffy as when we got them. They are larger and fuller than other pillows but the king size does fill our our king cases very well. I may buy a couple more for kids and guest beds.
customer_reviews.author: Christel B.

customer_reviews.title: No support
customer_reviews.text: Based my purchase on reviews. Very dissapointex. Offers no support for my neck. Very soft and not firm at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness!!! This is the best pillow I have EVER slept on! It's firm, pliable, soft supportive and affordable. It cradles my head nicely so that my body is perfectly aligned with my head. I have no more neck or back cramps. Truly life changing for me.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette

customer_reviews.title: Good quality pillows
customer_reviews.text: Been going through pillows the last year and didn't find one that I like, I these yesterday and I was surprised on how good they felt, I will keep them and see how they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Matt ME

customer_reviews.title: Love them! Very soft
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Very soft, not quite as "Cool" as I hoped for but I wasnt looking for a miracle. I never knew king sized pillows were so big, glad I had the correct pillow cases!
customer_reviews.author: D. Fritchman

customer_reviews.title: Quality, Cooling, & Affordable
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this set of king pillows! After buying many more expensive pillows looking for something that would be cooler, these very reasonably priced pillows delivered. I normally like feather pillows because they are moldable, but they retain heat and make me over-heated. These pillows are fluffy, yet not so overstuffed that they are not flexible. The are slightly more stiff than a real feather pillow, but I was able to sleep comfortably. After testing for several nights, it stayed a very consistent temperature. The fabric is really soft and slick, and the construction seems to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Nestworthy

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Once you cut the vacuum sealed bag that contains the pillow and hear it start to inhale air. You'll fall in love. It feels amazing and after you get up, it puffs back up. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: This is one Awesome Pillow!
customer_reviews.text: This is one Awesome Pillow!! Over the last 2 years, I have purchased several high-end expensive pillows only to be disappointed with a terrible night sleep and a stiff neck. My first night with this pillow i slept the entire night without waking up once. That's unheard of for me. Great product definitely worth more than what they are charging.
customer_reviews.author: Spokane2819

customer_reviews.title: So far we love them. Great price too
customer_reviews.text: Just got the pillows a few days ago. So far we love them. Great price too. We’ve spent way more on pillows in stores in the past and have not been satisfied. We’ll have to see how these last over time.
customer_reviews.author: RyGuy

customer_reviews.title: Good support
customer_reviews.text: These are pillows that never need to be fluffed. They are kind of an odd shape but I put them in a regular pillow case causing them to stay a bit more voluptuous and fluffy.
customer_reviews.author: Scuzzystreetrat

customer_reviews.title: Best pillow ever
customer_reviews.text: Sooo sooo comfy!! I have struggled to find the right pillow. This one is great! Head molds into the pillow. I'm a side sleeper and the pillow is big enough for my head and my arms to wrap around it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L Hurd

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars in my book!
customer_reviews.text: Both my husband and myself love these pillows. So much, we bought another set. They are a bit on the heavy side, but the support is awesome. We've only had the first set for about 3 weeks now and couldn't be happier. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Deb H.

customer_reviews.title: Great for stomach sleepers!
customer_reviews.text: These pillows are awesome! As a stomach sleeper I often have issues with memory foam or other more expensive pillows. This pillow is so comfortable, I have no neck problems after using it. The cooling feature is also great - it actually keeps you cooler while sleeping. I was 8 months pregnant when I got this pillow and wish I had gotten it sooner. Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Smec

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Great pillow! Comfortable, supportive, keeps it's shape. Requires a larger King size pillow case. I had to shove it into the ones I had, which kept it quite bulky, but the larger case allowed it to keep its natural shape. Seems a little big at first, as it doesn't sink or 'melt' like traditional down, if that's what you're used to. By third night, we adjusted and are quite happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Lori D.

customer_reviews.title: Buy! If you want to sleep like a baby tonight you better buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough about these pillows!! Have been loving them for over a year! Never goes flat, like sleeping on a cloud! Best sleep ever!
customer_reviews.author: M workman

customer_reviews.title: Great pillows
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice and I love how they can be washed in the washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer W.

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband. He loves them! His only comment was that they could be a little thicker. But, he is very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Carter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy pillow. I sleep on my side and they provide the perfect neck support
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE PILLOWS!
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I’m sleeping on clouds every night. I got the king size for our king bed and they are so big and grand I barely have to move all night to readjust unlike my old pillows where I had to constantly move them around to get comfortable again.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Great product. A bit heavy for my taste since i like to move my pillows around while i lay. It is a bit on the firm side but i like it that way. all in all a good buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: New favorite Pillow!
customer_reviews.text: They come vacuum packed but fluff right up. I'd give them a couple hours to get all the air back in them. They are so comfortable. You fall right into them and they give plenty of support. My new favorite pillows!
customer_reviews.author: Austin Alexander

customer_reviews.title: cases make them like rocks. Do not understand where the gel comes ...
customer_reviews.text: None of my pillow cases fit. Pillows too full, cases make them like rocks. Do not understand where the gel comes in, not cool.
customer_reviews.author: Rae Heim

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Solid and Smushy - No Neck Pain!
customer_reviews.text: Best pillows EVER! They are soft, thick, heavy, sturdy, and nice and big. I sleep well and do not have to double the pillow over for support.
customer_reviews.author: CoCoLatte

customer_reviews.title: Not cooling gel
customer_reviews.text: It seemed like it would be good support but it is the exact opposite of cool. I've never been so hot from a pillow. I had to switch back to my old pillow halfway through the night even after turning the temperature colder than normal in my house. I'm returning my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Fantasyfan22

customer_reviews.title: product looks very soft and comfortable but as soon as you lay on it it ...
customer_reviews.text: product looks very soft and comfortable but as soon as you lay on it it goes very very flat, not support or cushioning
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: I like hugging a pillow at night
customer_reviews.text: I like hugging a pillow at night, I am a stomach sleeper, these pillows are ENORMOUS! My husband hates these though, it's too big and gives him a neck ache. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Janina Fajardo

customer_reviews.title: Best pillows ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome pillows....best I’ve ever had and used in my entire life. Excellent purchase and planning to buy two more!!!
customer_reviews.author: mholly99

customer_reviews.title: These were great. I have to buy another set as I ...
customer_reviews.text: These were great. I have to buy another set as I just lost these in a fire. Take a little bit breaking into, but when you do they are fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Coll

customer_reviews.title: At first I thought it would be a little too ...
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought it would be a little too soft for my liking, but it's firmer once it's in the pillow case.
customer_reviews.author: 53K5HUN-8

customer_reviews.title: Pillow is completely useless my head can feel the bed underneath the pillow
customer_reviews.text: If I could give it less stars I would. Pillow is completely useless my head can feel the bed underneath the pillow. As far as shifting goes all the fiber shifts to each end of the pillow leaving no padding.
customer_reviews.author: MelodyAnn Clark

customer_reviews.title: ... but ended up with these as these are the best in our opinion
customer_reviews.text: We ordered five of the highest rated pillows but ended up with these as these are the best in our opinion. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Broseph

customer_reviews.title: I'm kind of in love?
customer_reviews.text: Soft...kind of like...laying your sweet, sleepy head on a giant fluffy marshmallow, the ends curling up and cupping your ears with its tiny, perfect, little marshmallow hands. Every time you floof them, it's like poking the tummy of the Pillsbury dough boy, except without the adorably jolly "Hoo-hoo!" laugh. Maybe something to work on, Sleep Restoration?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not cool
customer_reviews.text: Feels like a nice hotel pillow. It does not feel “cool” so this will not work for the person I bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: Duckyred

customer_reviews.title: Just right!
customer_reviews.text: These pillows are not too firm and not too soft. I think they re right in between and love them!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley August

customer_reviews.title: Really pleased and surprised honestly
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased and surprised honestly. They are good quality, very comfortable and nice weight (substantial but not too heavy). Would recommend (I am picky & only buy the best).
customer_reviews.author: Yves

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: These pillows have good support but I find that my head is raised too much and did not have good sleep after trying it for a few weeks. Gel probably isn't for me. This feels solid and not fluffy like the hotel pillows.
customer_reviews.author: P. W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best pillow i've ever owned. It is the perfect balance of soft and firm and allows you to lay perfectly no matter when your sleeping position. I was definitely hesitant buying a pillow off of amazon without touching it or anything first...but I'll probably just re-order these whenever I need no pillows in the future. My only complaint is that they are so comfy I never want to get out of bed.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Great pillows
customer_reviews.text: The pillows are extremely comfortable to sleep on. I have neck problems and have a difficult time trying to get in a good sleeping position. Not any more!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are the most amazing pillows I've bought for myself. I loved mine so much I bought my mom a pair as well!
customer_reviews.author: CN

customer_reviews.title: Well-made comfortable pillows
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase. The pillows are very comfortable and feel cool to the touch. I plan to purchase additional sets in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: ACD

customer_reviews.title: We absolutely love them? They stay cool and squishy while still ...
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love them? They stay cool and squishy while still supporting my head and neck. And no more midnight sneezing fits!
customer_reviews.author: tbelle

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these pillows! I ordered the king sized and the lining is soft enough that you don't need a pillowcase. They came vacuum sealed also.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomerATX512

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: fantastic pillows, best I have had in years - I would definitely reorder and recommend

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality! I’m hopeful that this will change the ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality! I’m hopeful that this will change the way I sleep!

customer_reviews.text: These pillows are super fluffy. Almost borderline too fluffy love lol but I love them

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the pillows. Extremely comfortable and soft but give support at the same time.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them, exactly what I was looking for and and a great price.

customer_reviews.title: The Bomb ...
customer_reviews.text: These pillows are fantastic ... they did make me wish I had king size pillow cases ... but the pillows themselves are the bomb!

customer_reviews.title: they are ok but not the best.
customer_reviews.text: I've had them awhile now, they are ok but not the best.

customer_reviews.title: I've only had these a few nights but I love them. The pillow doesn't overheat you and isn't ...
customer_reviews.text: I've only had these a few nights but I love them. The pillow doesn't overheat you and isn't too stiff or fluffed up.
customer_reviews.author: sburwell

customer_reviews.title: So awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely pleased with these pillows!! I even got my sister hooked on them and she bought two.
customer_reviews.author: Lysette wood

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it...it is a little too tall for me.
customer_reviews.author: Vikki Simpson

customer_reviews.title: They do keep you cool.
customer_reviews.text: It does keep you cool. A little heavy but worth it.so glad i found these pillows.
customer_reviews.author: ShortyT

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have had many many different pillows over the years these pillows are the best by far for the price. They are not so soft that they go flat and not too firm that your neck is bent. Amazing buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... am a side sleeper and the gusseted pillow is amazing. My neck pain is gone and so is ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a side sleeper and the gusseted pillow is amazing. My neck pain is gone and so is the ear pain I had when sleeping on my side previously. I love this pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Wynn

customer_reviews.title: A bit too soft for me...
customer_reviews.text: It is not as supportive as some reviews say. Very comfortable but sinks in too much. Gives me swollen eyelids every single day..

customer_reviews.text: These are the most amazing pillows! They are soft but also very supportive. I have been using them for a week and I haven’t woke up with a neck ache....which was always an issue for me
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: These pillows are great. When I first got them I thought that ...
customer_reviews.text: These pillows are great. When I first got them I thought that they would be to bulky but your head sinks right into it. I have slept great on these since I got them a month ago.
customer_reviews.author: randallpink

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite but decent
customer_reviews.text: The pillow is too tall and not enough support for my neck. It did not give me any neck pains but uncomfortable. I prefer a different brand that I bought at a store.
customer_reviews.author: shoeslover

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow, very comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: We love the pillows! We use them with a firm bamboo pillow underneath for added support until it’s time to go to sleep. Then my head just sinks into the cooling gel and off to sleep I go!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Horn

customer_reviews.title: These are the perfect amount of softness without getting flat during the night
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect amount of softness without getting flat during the night. Since I've gotten them I've had a much easier time getting comfortable, and have gotten much better sleep. They really feel like hotel pillows, definitely worth the purchase!

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: If you like a very heavy and thick pillow then you will like it

customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable! Almost feels like a down pillow with more substance. I love it.

customer_reviews.text: The pillows are ok but way too soft I feel like I sink in them

customer_reviews.text: I love these pillows! Supportive and hell me sleep better at night.

customer_reviews.text: Very nice pillow. Good support throughout the night. Does get warm, but not as frequently as past pillows. Would purchase again.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome

customer_reviews.title: Better than fancy hotel pillows!
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé and I LOVE these pillows!! We recently upgraded to a king size bed and needed king size pillows to go with it. We searched amazon and came up with these after reading the reviews and we couldn’t be happier!!
customer_reviews.author: Annie Jackson

customer_reviews.title: These are the best pillows I have ever slept on
customer_reviews.text: These are the best pillows I have ever slept on. Don't be fooled by how they look flat when you receive them...once you take them out of the package they plump up and are wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Less tossing and turning in the middle of the night...
customer_reviews.text: Best pillows ever!!!!! Very comfortable. When I lay my head down on this pillow, it literally forms itself around my head and neck to where it sits perfectly for my rest. Definitely less tossing and turning in the middle of the night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Flat as a board... I will be returning mine. As soon as you lay your head on this pillow it goes completely flat. No neck support at all.

customer_reviews.text: Instantly ordered 3 more sets. for every bedroom They are FANTASTIC!!!!! Really does feel like Vacation pillows.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Improved my ability to fall asleep at night. The pillows don't warm up too quick.
customer_reviews.author: Connor

customer_reviews.title: Fit the description
customer_reviews.text: I bought these pillows when we upgraded from a queen to a king and I’m so happy with the purchase. We went from a regular spring mattress to a temperpedic and thought these pillows would fit the bill in keeping us cool at night.
customer_reviews.author: Shonna B

customer_reviews.title: The pillows are comfortable and provide a great restful sleep
customer_reviews.text: The pillows are comfortable and provide a great restful sleep. I am very pleased with the product and would recommend it to others.

customer_reviews.text: Great product. Good quality... Honestly better than expected. Worth every penny.

product_meta.title: Restoration 1500 Series Gusset Gel Pillow - (2 Pack King) Plush Cooling Gel Fiber - Hypoallergenic & Dust Mite Resistant
feature_bullets: 1500 SERIES LUXURY – Our Restoration Gel-Fiber Filled 1500 Series Gusset Pillows are crafted in super plush gel fiber that puts all other standard pillows to shame! They are expertly tailored to ensure maximum comfort for any and all sleeping positions.

AMAZING GUSSET COMFORT – The gusseted cover helps our Gel-Fiber Filling expand and gives structure to the pillows. The extra material in the gusset creates more space for a fuller, cloud-like resting space, and the no-shift construction will provide consistent comfort no matter what position you sleep in. The combination of the gusseted cover and gel-fiber filling work together harmoniously, making sure that right amount of support all night long.

DUST MITE, MOLD & MILDEW RESISTANT– Our pillows are hypallergenic and resistant to dust mites, mold, and mildew! Additionally, they are completely allergen and chemical free. They are the perfect choice for those suffering from asthma, allergies, and other respiratory issues.

FADE RESISTANT & STAIN RESISTANT – The Restoration Gel-Filled Fiber 1500 Series Gusset Pillows are fade and stain resistant, so you’ll never have to worry! Our pillows are machine washable, and will always feel and look like new!

SATISFACTION GUARANTEED – We are so confident in the quality of our product that we offer a 30-day satisfaction guarantee! If you are unsatisfied, simply contact us to return the product for a full refund.
